title: Set the Mars26.com default landing coordinates!
body:
The current starting ULR is https://mars26.com/#heading=29&latitude=0.5&longitude=-98.5&tilt=49&zoom=4.7

From which angle should Mars present itself? Choose wisely:

1)  Heading Down the Valley https://mars26.com/#heading=120.3&latitude=-6.4&longitude=-100&tilt=80&zoom=13

2) Perseverance https://mars26.com/#heading=0&latitude=18.5&longitude=77.7&tilt=58&zoom=9.5

3) Olympus Mons https://mars26.com/#heading=0&latitude=18.6&longitude=-133.6&tilt=64.71736361735118&zoom=6.8

3)  Martian Traces https://mars26.com/#heading=296&latitude=11&longitude=157.5&tilt=80.5&zoom=11

4) Valley of Valleys https://mars26.com/#heading=137&latitude=-11&longitude=-96.5&tilt=85.5&zoom=8
author: 0x273DefdC79b9944EcFAD117454EC5Ba3e65a0D87
